## About program

**Albanianames** is a Shiny app which interactively show popularity of Albanian names for 2011-2014 year.

## Head

Here you can search by **name** and selecting **gender**

## Top 10 

This is an informative tab showing maps and comparision charts 

## NameCloud

Here you can filter by **region** and **year**. You can select the number of names to show in wordcloud. You will see most popular names by size

## Comparision

Here you can see by selecting **region** differences between different regions regarding popularity in names

## Popularity

Here you can enter your name in capital letters. Graph shown will display popularity through years
